files.patch:
@@ -47,1 +47,0 @@
-#include <stdbool.h>
@@ -49,0 +48,11 @@
+/** Begin JDK modifications to support building using old compilers**/
+#ifndef _WIN32
+#include <stdbool.h>
+#else
+#ifdef bool
+#undef bool
+#endif
+typedef int bool;
+#define false 0
+#define true 1
+/** End JDK modifications to support building using old compilers**/
